cast.overview: Mimma starts working in Madame Colette’s brothel to help her boyfriend financially. There she is rechristened “Paprika,” and falls in love with her first client, naval officer Franco. Despite this attraction, she begins her climb through the sex trade, residing in Italy’s most illustrious brothels.
cast.title: Paprika

details.biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Domiziano Arcangeli (born June 10, 1968 in Venice, Italy) is an Italian and American actor, producer, and writer.

details.name: Domiziano Arcangeli
